entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
